title: DTL Kern Master
content:
Hi typophiles,

I wanted to know if anyone has bought/used Kern Master,  
we are thinking of acquiring it, but we would like some reviews first.

[http://www.fontmaster.nl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804104930/http:/www.fontmaster.nl/ "http://www.fontmaster.nl/")

Thank you!
author: ferfolio_2

comments.content:
I have used the program and achieved acceptable results with a few add-ons, available free. The biggest problems with the exiting version is that you can't see your results graphically within the program itself.

There were plans underway to release a version in 2012 with a graphic user interface but, as far as I know, that hasn't happened.
Thank you for the info Nick, very useful! :)

Hi there,

I tested last year the beta version with graphic interface. It works rather well and if you combine it with manual kerning you save time and achieve good results.  
I will buy it as soon as it is released.
